feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.62
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for a regression with client statements
  • v5.10.62 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10352

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.61...v5.10.62

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.0
entry.content:
## What's Changed\ * einvoicing over PEPPOL network. * Additional validation rules for custom surcharges by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10355 * v5.11.0 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10360

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.62...v5.11.0

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for merge pdf by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10362
  • Notifications: Generic message by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10361
  • Fixes for purchase order designs by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10380
  • Further improvements for public notifications by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10367
  • Fix inbound issues by @paulwer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10392
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10384
  • v5.11.1 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10402
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10399
  • Nordigen fixes by @dshoreman in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.0...v5.11.1
